im americas most wanted  he didnt work. his family was well overdue and they supported him and he was a free spender. he was flashy. he liked the nightlife. he liked to go clubbing. he was described as a very handsome individual. one that all he had to do was snap his fingers and all the girls would go to him.  you put two of americas most wanted together. you get classic material and thats what this is. west coast all the way to the midwest. we run this. here we go
